property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only as your first [Click]. The first time you access an agenda this turn, gain 7[Credits].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the sun sank towards the horizon, the glittering lights of the expo remained dark. But the shanty city bloomed to life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2[Credits]: Swap a piece of barrier ice currently being encountered with a piece of ice directly before or after it. The run continues from this new position. You are still encountering that ice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cowabunga, dude!

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Trash]: The Corp cannot rez the outermost piece of ice during a run on any server this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "First, you get a horde of zombies. Then you do whatever you want, 'cuz you have a horde of zombies." -Ji "Noise" Reilly

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Savvy Investor

property.name: Rules
property.value: The first time you make a successful run on a central server each turn, you may force the Corp to draw 1 card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only as your first [Click]. Each player draws 3 cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The secret to investing is networking." -Laramy Fisk

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Click]: Host up to 3 cards from your grip facedown on Bookmark (you may look at these cards at any time). [Click] or [Trash]: Add all cards on Bookmark to your grip.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you make a successful run, place 1 power counter on DaVinci. [Trash]: Install a card from your grip with an install cost equal to or less than the number of power counters on DaVinci, ignoring the install cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our life is made by the death of others." -Leonardo Da Vinci

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to spend [Click] to trash a resource (not through a card ability), the Corp must pay 2[Credits].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Almost a zettabyte of data flows each minute through one of the many net pavilions scattered around the expo.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your maximum hand size is increased by 4.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Cybernetics Court has seven floors of attractions. The plasteel used to construct it was even more expensive than the thousands of cybernetic implants displayed inside.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you score an agenda, you may install a card from Archives or HQ, ignoring the install cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The SanSan Outlaws have a close relationship with Haas-Bioroid's sports engineering division, SHIFT.

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Selective Mind-mapping

property.name: Rules
property.value: For the first net damage the Runner suffers each turn, you may look at the Runner's grip and select the card that is trashed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever the Runner jacks out, do 1 net damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The more people submit their DNA and family history to the program, the more accurate it becomes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The Runner cannot draw more than 2 cards during his or her turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Genetics Pavilion was designed by renowned architect Meru Mati II. It was built without the aid of bioroids, instead relying on human and clone labor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When the Runner accesses an agenda, add Franchise City to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are over 20,000 brands represented in Franchise City, all of them owned by fewer than 100 corps.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If the Runner accesses Product Placement from R&D, he or she must reveal it. When the Runner accesses Product Placement, the Corp gains 2[Credits]. Ignore this effect if Product Placement is accessed from Archives.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Worlds Plaza can host up to 3 assets. [Click]: Install an asset from HQ on Worlds Plaza and rez it, lowering its rez cost by 2, if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The holosculpture depicts the three inhabited worlds. The square can hold almost 1% of their total population.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Place 3 power counters on Public Support when it is rezzed. When there are no power counters left on Public Support, add it to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point. When your turn begins, remove 1 power counter from Public Support.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tour Guide gains "[Subroutine] End the run." for each razzed asset you have.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hello, and welcome to the Universe of Tomorrow! You could live for five-hundred years and not see all of the attractions I can tell you about."

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your turn begins, gain 1[Credits] if there is a rezzed asset installed in this server. Limit 1 region per server.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The expo was built in the East California desert: a temporary city constructed for the advancement of humanity.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you score The Future is Now, search R&D for a card and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
